short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minecraft is a game about breaking and placing blocks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: At first, people built structures to protect against nocturnal monsters, but as the game grew players worked together to create wonderful, imaginative things
